name: Shikari 100 game design document
description:
University assignment. February 2021

72-page GDD

This is a university team project, which became Solar Flare's 'Shikari X' (https://solar-flare-london.itch.io/).

Credits:

Written by Sam Mortimer, Max Elmore, Spike Foster and Vlad Tipu.

Compiled by Max Elmore.

Proofread and edited by Sam Mortimer.

Each page had a specific author. The author is credited on the top left of each page, underneath the triangle with the page number.
